subject: Surfing
lead_paragraph: In fashioning a new surfboard for himself, Thomas Meyerhoffer, who has worked for Apple and Porsche, has made the sport’s most radical design leap in 50 years.
snippet: In fashioning a new surfboard for himself, Thomas Meyerhoffer, who has worked for Apple and Porsche, has made the sport’s most radical design leap in 50 years.
